languages.text: "Еще бы. У Миссии Касбаллика нет более {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Max}надежного и выгодного делового партнера{/d}, чем Ваша Светлость. Поэтому примите этот и другие дары, которые будут доставлены на ваш корабль, как инвестиции в ваш успех".

"Why, of course. No business partner of the Kasballica Mission is {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Max}more reliable or more lucrative{/d} than Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Therefore, accept this gift and others that will be delivered to your ship as investments in your success."
languages.original_text: "Еще бы. У Миссии Касбаллика нет более {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Max}надежного и выгодного делового партнера{/d}, чем Ваша Светлость. Поэтому примите этот и другие дары, которые будут доставлены на ваш корабль, как инвестиции в ваш успех".

traits.locale_text: "Why, of course. No business partner of the Kasballica Mission is more reliable or more lucrative than Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Therefore accept this gift and others that will be delivered to your ship as investments in your success."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "Why, of course. No business partner of the Kasballica Mission is {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Max}more reliable or more lucrative{/d} than Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Therefore, accept this gift and others that will be delivered to your ship as investments in your success."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "Why, of course. No business partner of the Kasballica Mission is {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Max}more reliable or more lucrative{/d} than Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Therefore, accept this gift and others that will be delivered to your ship as investments in your success."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: “怎么，当然了。对卡斯巴利卡集团而言，{d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Max}没有比您更可靠、更实惠的商业伙伴了{/d}，大人。因此，请收下这件礼物，以及其他即将送到您船上的礼物，就当这是您的投资回报把。”
languages.original_text: "Why, of course. No business partner of the Kasballica Mission is {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Max}more reliable or more lucrative{/d} than Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Therefore, accept this gift and others that will be delivered to your ship as investments in your success."

traits.locale_text: “怎么，当然了。卡斯巴利卡犯罪集团没有比您更可靠，更有利可图的商业伙伴了，大人。因此，请收下这件礼物，以及其他即将送到您船上的礼物，作为您的投资回报吧。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: 「陛下ほど{d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Max}信頼でき利益の上がる{/d}ビジネスパートナーは、カスバリカ聖務団にいません。そういうわけですので、この贈り物や船に届けられる贈り物を受け取ってください。陛下の成功への投資としてお考えください」
languages.original_text: "Why, of course. No business partner of the Kasballica Mission is {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Max}more reliable or more lucrative{/d} than Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Therefore, accept this gift and others that will be delivered to your ship as investments in your success."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下ほど{d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Max}信頼でき利益の上がる{/d}ビジネスパートナーは、カスバリカ聖務団にいません。そういうわけですので、この贈り物や船に届けられる贈り物を受け取ってください。陛下の成功への投資としてお考えください」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: «Por supuesto. Ningún socio de la misión Kasballica es {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Max}más fiable y más lucrativo{/d} que mi{mf|lord|lady}. Acepte este regalo y otros que le llegarán a su nave como inversiones por su éxito».
languages.original_text: "Why, of course. No business partner of the Kasballica Mission is {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Max}more reliable or more lucrative{/d} than Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Therefore, accept this gift and others that will be delivered to your ship as investments in your success."

traits.locale_text: «Por supuesto. Ningún socio de la misión Kasballica es más fiable y más lucrativo que mi{mf|lord|lady}. Acepte este regalo y otros que le llegarán a su nave como inversiones por su éxito».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Aber natürlich. Kein Geschäftspartner der Kasballica-Mission ist {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Max}zuverlässiger oder lukrativer{/d} als Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Akzeptiert daher dieses Geschenk und andere, die ich auf Euer Schiff bringen lasse, als Investition in Euren Erfolg."
languages.original_text: "Why, of course. No business partner of the Kasballica Mission is {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Max}more reliable or more lucrative{/d} than Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Therefore, accept this gift and others that will be delivered to your ship as investments in your success."

traits.locale_text: "Aber natürlich. Kein Geschäftspartner der Kasballica-Mission ist zuverlässiger oder lukrativer als Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Akzeptiert daher dieses Geschenk und andere, die ich auf Euer Schiff bringen lasse, als Investition in Euren Erfolg."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: « Bien sûr. Votre Seigneurie est {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Max}{mf|l'associé le|l'associée la} plus fiable et {mf|le plus lucratif|la plus lucrative}{/d} de la Mission de la Kasballica. Je vous prie donc de bien vouloir accepter ce présent, ainsi que d'autres qui seront livrés directement sur votre vaisseau, comme des investissements dans votre réussite. »
languages.original_text: "Why, of course. No business partner of the Kasballica Mission is {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Max}more reliable or more lucrative{/d} than Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Therefore, accept this gift and others that will be delivered to your ship as investments in your success."

traits.locale_text: « Bien sûr. Votre Seigneurie est l'{mf|associé le|associée la} plus fiable et {mf|le plus lucratif|la plus lucrative} de la Mission de la Kasballica. Je vous prie donc de bien vouloir accepter ce présent, ainsi que d'autres qui seront livrés directement sur votre vaisseau, comme des investissements dans votre réussite. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Elbette ki. Kasballica Misyonu'nun sahip olduğu çözüm ortaklarından hiçbirisi, {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nden {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Max}daha güvenilir olmayıp daha fazla kazanç sağlamaz{/d}. Dolayısıyla bu armağanı ve geminize teslim edilecek, başarınız için bir nevi yatırım görevi gören diğer armağanları kabul buyurun."
languages.original_text: "Why, of course. No business partner of the Kasballica Mission is {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Max}more reliable or more lucrative{/d} than Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Therefore, accept this gift and others that will be delivered to your ship as investments in your success."

traits.locale_text: "Elbette ki. Kasballica Misyonu'nun sahip olduğu çözüm ortaklarından hiçbirisi {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nden {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Max}daha güvenilir değildir veya daha fazla kazanç sağlamaz{/d}. Dolayısıyla bu armağanı ve geminize teslim edilecek, başarınız için bir nevi yatırım görevi gören diğer armağanları lütfen kabul edin."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04
